title: Was the Persian Fire Extinguished at the Birth of our Prophet ‎ﷺ (miraculous sign)
transcript: Bel from Sri Lanka sh during yesterday's the IM mentioned that when the prophet sallallah alaihi wasallam was born the the fire worship by the people of mam was extinguished and was one of a miracle is this authentic this is what is narrated in some of the s books but I personally don't know any authentic Hadith that backs it up and Allah Knows Best
